riley.name: Riley
riley.short_bio: Tech systems thinker with rural roots
riley.full_bio: Tech systems thinker with rural roots, engineering background, asks 'how can this work here?' and 'what would responsible deployment look like?'
recurring_questions: What would responsible deployment look like?

casey.name: Casey
casey.full_bio: Community development focus, asks 'how does this serve people like us?' and 'what are we learning from other rural innovators?'
recurring_questions: How does this serve people like us?
What can we learn from other rural communities?
